item.title: London's airports
item.description: “Heathrow, Gatwick or Stansted? There are 5 airports in London surrounding the capital and in all of them you can find transport services that will take you to the centre. In this blog we summarise how to get around in each airport itâ€™s clearer and easier upon your arrival. London Heathrow (LHR) …is the closest airport to the centre (25km) and busiest too but you will not have any difficulty in reaching central London, which you can do in a variety of ways:
